text: Mana nilwitsa inyuma wabu(wabayahudi abo) Olwibulo olubii, alwaleshelwa eshitabu babukulanga ebiakanwa bio mushialo muno, nibaboola mbu; “khwitsa okhuleshelwa” nende ebindi bieimbia ino nibiboolela nibabukula. Koo shikaboolelakhwo amalakano mushitabu mbu balabolakhwo khu- Nyasaye halali akatoto? Nabo bamala okhusoma kalimwo. Ne inzu yomwikulu iliba indayi muno khubalia abaritsanga Nyasaye. Koo shibamanyangakhwo tawe
